result.arabic_text: وَمَا كَانَ صَلَاتُهُمۡ عِندَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ إِلَّا مُكَآءٗ وَتَصۡدِيَةٗۚ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ
result.translation: Their prayer at the Sacred House was nothing but whistling and clapping. So taste the punishment[20] for your disbelief.
result.footnotes: [20] Their degrading defeat, killing and captivation at Badr.
